title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sen. Ted Cruz, Rishi Sharma, & Adam Sandoval | 5/28/21
description:
Sen. Ted Cruz calls in to discuss a new bill he introduced called the “No Vaccine Passports Act” and Biden’s $6 trillion budget proposal. Rishi Sharma, host of Legends of WWII, joins Glenn to talk about his mission to interview World War II veterans and share their stories. Philanthropist Adam Sandoval joins to describe his journey to raise awareness of our military veterans.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Sen. Ted Cruz calls in to discuss a new bill he introduced called the “No Vaccine Passports Act” and Biden’s $6 trillion budget proposal. Rishi Sharma, host of Legends of WWII, joins Glenn to talk about his mission to interview World War II veterans and share their stories. Philanthropist Adam Sandoval joins to describe his journey to raise awareness of our military veterans.
